REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0814 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-DEF 04-09 0038

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET DEFICIT REVISED DOWNWARD
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it has revised its estimate of today's shortfall to 350 mln stg from 400 mln, before taking account of 103 mln stg morning assistance. REUTER
